titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide for a review of a decision concerning a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant in Washtenaw County, Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to direct the Assistant Administrator for Water to grant the petition submitted on May 31, 1996, on behalf of Washtenaw County, Michigan, for review of a Regional Administrator's decision involving a construction grant for the Ypsilanti Wastewater Treatment Plant.
